description: The program aims to provide training in intelligent systems and energy production and management systems. access_conditions: Admission to this Master's program is based on a review of academic records and a competitive exam. Applicants should hold a bachelor's degree in a related field or an equivalent recognized diploma that meets the admission criteria specified by the program.
